Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory973.jpg'}
{3: 'I was invited to an outdoor music lecture in the residential area, but it started pouring rain halfway through.'}
{3: 'My terminal says an ecological module in the residential area broke down, messing up the water cycle and causing this heavy rain.'}
{3: 'It was unexpected—neither the organizers nor the audience were prepared. Everyone had to take shelter in nearby buildings, waiting for it to clear up.'}
{3: 'They said the Engineering Force started emergency repairs, and things might be back to normal soon...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Unfortunately—the problem was damaged hardware. They need to replace everything, so this rain's going to last a while.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A woman in a gray-white uniform suddenly appears beside you, also looking out the window.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But, finding the problem before it did real damage means this rain might be a blessing, really.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael...'}
{3: 'These private little meetings with her seem to be happening more and more often.'}
{2: 'Good evening.', 3: '15'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Good evening.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The rain's not stopping anytime soon. Since you have evening plans, would you like me to take you back now?", 4: '1'}
{3: "You see the long umbrella in Ishmael's hand, but what she just said is even more surprising."}
{3: "There's a book I've wanted to read, but haven't had the time. I was planning to read it during my free time today."}
{3: "But I don't recall ever telling anyone about this..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Because you always have a packed schedule.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if she can tell you are confused, Ishmael smiles gently and lifts her umbrella.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm actually headed that way too. It's on my way, so we can go together.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory261.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Walking side by side under the umbrella, Ishmael softly hums a tune that sounds familiar.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Can you tell what song it is?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The one they mentioned at the start of the lecture?', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Correct.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Actually, I came to this lecture partly because they were talking about this song.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I remember you know this song well, and the dance that goes with it.', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's a pretty well-known dance tune, you know. I know it a little.", 3: '50'}
{3: 'Did I tell her about this?'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'In that case, would you care to dance?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure, when we have the chance—', 3: '54'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before you finish, Ishmael stops and holds out her hand.'}
{3: 'Ishmael keeps her soft smile and holds out her hand, nodding gently.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: "You're completely alone. The rain's like a thick curtain, hiding the buildings and muffling everything. Only the streetlights manage to shine through, lighting the way."}
{3: "It really feels like we're on a stage."}
{2: "It's still raining...", 3: '66', 4: "(Take Ishmael's hand)", 5: '74'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Don't worry, get closer. You won't get wet.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "You take Ishmael's hand gently, move close until you're face to face, and place your right hand on her lower back."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Relax. If you get the steps wrong, it's fine—just go with it.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "You take Ishmael's hand gently, move close until you're face to face, and place your right hand on her lower back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Relax. If you get the steps wrong, it's fine—just go with it.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Everything's set. After a short pause, Ishmael hums the tune. You take the first step, following the melody, and she instantly matches you."}
{3: "Step forward, step back—Ishmael's moves are perfectly timed, both leading and following. Even someone who's never danced could keep up with her."}
{3: 'Through all the moves and spins, the umbrella stays right over them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Let's speed it up a little.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You swear you can hear violins all around you, the melody getting livelier. Whether it's the music or something else, you feel a rush of joy, and your movements get smoother and more carefree."}
{3: 'Step, lean, spin—the umbrella moves with you, shifting between your hands as you dance, spraying water with each movement.'}

{3: "As the music hits another high point, you spin Ishmael out. You briefly move apart, and then the umbrella makes a soft thump as it stops swinging. Only then do you notice you are out of the umbrella's cover."}
{3: "But it doesn't start pouring. It might just be your imagination, but everything seems to freeze when the dance stops—thousands of raindrops hanging still in the air."}
{3: 'Ishmael gently pulls you as she spins back, leaning gracefully against you to finish the dance—just as the umbrella covers you again and the rain comes down hard.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This is a perfect ending.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael straightens up and casually fixes her hair, which is a little messed up. She looks happier now, smiling wider than before.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Hmm, the gift's ready now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You'll see when you get back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory717.jpg'}
{3: 'Nothing else happens. Ishmael walks you to the door, says a quick goodbye, and leaves. Back in your room, you are still thinking about what she said.'}
{3: 'While you are thinking, you grab the book you mean to read but find an art book next to it.'}
{3: "Opening it, you see pages of sketches—simple, but full of life. Flipping through, you see drawings that seem to capture someone's memorable moments from a long trip."}
{3: "Flipping to the last page, you see a sketch of two people dancing in the rain—it's you and Ishmael."}
{3: "At the bottom, there's a line of elegant handwriting."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png'}
{1: '"Gray Raven, happy birthday."', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 6: '1', 7: '-5', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
